What is a Wallet Seed in Verus, and why is it important to keep it secure?

A Wallet Seed in Verus is a unique string of characters that allows access to your wallet. It is crucial to keep it secure, as anyone with the Seed can access your wallet and manage your funds. It is recommended to copy and save the Seed in a secure location, such as a password manager or a physical safe, and to write it down as a backup.

Step 4
Next, you’ll see that a new Wallet Seed has been created for you. Simply copy it and save it somewhere secure (I also recommend writing it down!). Anyone with that Seed can access your wallet, so security is key. Paste it or type it into the Confirm Wallet Seed section, then scroll down and optionally create a Password to encrypt your new Seed into a file for easy logins..the password is created in “Enter your key”..finally name it something unique and click “Register”Step 5
Now you can login using the Password you just created, once signed in you’ll find your new Public Verus Coin Wallet Address (VRSC Address) at the top of the screen as seen below. Copy this public address and have it ready for Part 2 below.
